attachments.title: Ladies' Night - A Happy Hour For Women in Digital
attachments.text: Instrument, 52LTD & Struck are hosting our second Ladies&#39; Night - a happy hour for women to meet and connect. If you&#39;re a designer, architect, researcher, developer, photographer, copywriter, videographer, producer, strategist, or want to be any of these things … you’re invited! Drinks and snacks are on us.
